alert.note: Alert for Aroostook (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 21 at 5:46PM EDT until July 21 at 6:45PM EDT by NWS Caribou
info.description: The National Weather Service in Caribou Maine has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Aroostook County in northern Maine... * Until 645 PM EDT. * At 546 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 13 miles northeast of Churchill Dam, or 18 miles east of Clayton Lake, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Fish River Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
